title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1626-2.5 - Legal action
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1626-2.5 - Legal action

State Regulations

The authority's counsel shall undertake such legal
steps as are deemed necessary to effect the vacating of site and offsite
property by the scheduled demolition date. Legal action should be started where
there is the slightest doubt that the tenant will be able to relocate by the
scheduled date. However, actual eviction should be effected only as a last
resort, usually in the case of obdurate and non-cooperative
tenants. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1626-2.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
